name: Ferry Ticket System
description: This project showcases my NestJS skills and integration with SvelteJS through a simple ferry ticketing system. Users can generate tickets that expire after two hours or two uses. While the frontend/authentication is functional, itâ€™s not the main focus. The inspiration for this project came from NYC Ferry, during a recent trip.

name: YxelWorks Website
description: My personal freelance website, where I offer professional web development services. Built with ReactJS and SCSS, this site showcases my expertise in web development and design, reflecting my commitment to delivering high-quality solutions for clients.
